press_Description: Turns fruits and vegetables into juices.
keg_DescriptionJuice: Turns select items into beverages, such as fruit juice into wine.
keg_DescriptionFruit: Turns select items into beverages, such as fruit into wine.
config.PressRetainsQuality.name: Press Retains Quality
config.PressRetainsQuality.description: Juice Press output quality will match the input quality, or the output quantity has a chance to double based on input quality.
config.UseNormalWineRecipe.name: Use Normal Wine Recipe
config.UseNormalWineRecipe.description: When enabled, wine will still be made when fruit is directly placed into kegs.
config.UseNormalBeerRecipe.name: Use Normal Beer Recipe
config.UseNormalBeerRecipe.description: When enabled, beer will still be made when wheat is directly placed into kegs.
config.UseNormalPaleAleRecipe.name: Use Normal Pale Ale Recipe
config.UseNormalPaleAleRecipe.descriptio: When enabled, pale ale will still be made when hops are directly placed into kegs.
